title: Plant Your Feet Here!!!!!! 2x1 Apartment
posting_body: ['The Perch on 52nd', '7797 W 52nd Ave, Arvada, CO, 80002', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'THE PERCH ON 52ND APARTMENTS FOR RENT IN ARVADA, CO', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.', 'Ft.', '“Pursuing Perfection”', 'Outstanding price, quality, and service are what you will find at The Perch on 52nd!', 'We offer comfort and convenience with all of our amenities.', 'Come enjoy our 24 Hour fitness center, furnished clubroom with cable and wireless services, business center, beautifully landscaped sitting areas, and sparkling swimming pool.', 'Our community offers one bedroom apartments, two bedroom apartments with one bath and two bedroom two bath apartments with a washer and dryer.', 'Call and schedule an appointment with our friendly staff today!', 'Features', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Pull-Out Kitchen Faucet', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Wood Style Plank Flooring', '- Slate Finished Appliances', '- Washer/Dryer', 'In Select Units', '- Built In Microwave*', '- Spacious Closets', '*Only available in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Pool-Side Barbecue Grills', '- Pets Welcome*', '- Heated Swimming Pool', '- Professional Management', '- Elevators In Each Building', '- Business Center', '- Laundry Room', 'In Each Building', '- Urban Village Program', '- 24 Hr Emergency Maintenance', '- Credit Builder Program', '- Resident Referral Programs', '- Pet Park', '- Online Maintenance and Payment Services', '- Clubhouse Lounge', '- Fully Equipped 24 Hr Fitness Center', '- Fire Pit Lounge', '*Weight and breed restrictions apply', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome- Weight and breed restrictions apply.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '8196tUTBrnKd']
